results.title: The impact of metformin use on the outcomes of relapse-remitting multiple sclerosis patients receiving interferon beta 1a: an exploratory prospective phase II open-label randomized controlled trial.
results.text_hl: We aimed to investigate the efficacy and safety of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as an adjuvant therapy to interferon beta 1a (IFNbeta-1a) in @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis_Relapsing_Remitting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020529 @@@relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis_Relapsing_Remitting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020529 @@@RRMS@@@) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
